column1: 711712,Hide and Skin Processing Machine Operator,,"Operate textile or leather cutting or production equipment

column13: Operate chemical processing or water treatment systems or equipment

column23: Set equipment controls to meet cutting specifications

column29: Prepare materials for preservation, storage or display

column39: Sort materials or products for processing, storing, shipping or grading
